name: w5
description: Coding web2+3 serverless and JAMstack with Vue, Cloudflare, and Lambda

scripts.upgrade-wash: pnpm wash && rimraf package-lock.json yarn.lock pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.wash: rimraf .yarn node_modules icarus/node_modules net23/node_modules oauth/node_modules site/node_modules oauth/.wrangler oauth/worker-configuration.d.ts site/worker-configuration.d.ts net23/.serverless net23/dist oauth/.svelte-kit site/.nuxt site/.output site/.wrangler site/dist
